games.saloon

Class YoungGun

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGameObject
      • games.saloon.GameObject
        • games.saloon.YoungGun

  • public class YoungGun
extends GameObject
    An eager young person that wants to join your gang, and will call in the veteran Cowboys you need to win the brawl in the saloon.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Tile callInTile
      The Tile that a Cowboy will be called in on if this YoungGun calls in a Cowboy.
      boolean canCallIn
      True if the YoungGun can call in a Cowboy, false otherwise.
      Player owner
      The Player that owns and can control this YoungGun.
      Tile tile
      The Tile this YoungGun is currently on.

      • Fields inherited from class games.saloon.GameObject

        gameObjectName, logs

      • Fields inherited from class joueur.BaseGameObject

        id

      Constructor and Description
      YoungGun()
      Creates a new instance of a YoungGun.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cowboy callIn(java.lang.String job)
      Tells the YoungGun to call in a new Cowboy of the given job to the open Tile nearest to them.

    • Field Detail

      • callInTile

        public Tile callInTile
        The Tile that a Cowboy will be called in on if this YoungGun calls in a Cowboy.

      • canCallIn

        public boolean canCallIn
        True if the YoungGun can call in a Cowboy, false otherwise.

      • owner

        The Player that owns and can control this YoungGun.

        public Tile tile
        The Tile this YoungGun is currently on.

    • Constructor Detail

      • YoungGun

        public YoungGun()
        Creates a new instance of a YoungGun. Used during game initialization, do not call directly.

    • Method Detail

      • callIn

        public Cowboy callIn(java.lang.String job)
        Tells the YoungGun to call in a new Cowboy of the given job to the open Tile nearest to them.
        Parameters:
        job - The job you want the Cowboy being brought to have.
        Returns:
        The new Cowboy that was called in if valid. They will not be added to any `cowboys` lists until the turn ends. Null otherwise.
